summary: In 1941, an Oklahoma college graduate joins the US Coast Guard and serves as a cook on a ship based in Boston.
cast: Andy Griffith|Felicia Farr|Walter Matthau|Erin O'Brien|Joe Mantell|Ray Danton|James Gregory|Joey Bishop|Roscoe Karns|Claude Akins|Ainslie Pryor|Sean Garrison|Dan Barton|Mark Roberts|Peter Brown|Tige Andrews|Karl Lukas|Morris D. Erby|Byron Foulger|David Armstrong|Joanna Barnes|Oliver Blake|Joe Brooks|Brad Brown|Bobby Byles|Fred Coby|Danny the Dog|Lester Dorr|Anthony Eisley|Richard Elmore|Fritz Ford|Frank Gerstle|Louise Glenn|Myron Healey|Tom Hennesy|Chuck Hicks|Michael Jeffers|Curtis Jurgens|Mike Lally|Gary Lockwood|Richard Lowcock|Paul Mantee|Kathy Marlowe|Vera Marshe|Frances Morris|Howard Negley|Joe Ploski|Hal Riddle|Jack Shea|Paul Smith|Bert Stevens|Charles Sullivan|Dale Van Sickel|Charles Watts|Bill White Jr.
title: Onionhead
